page.title: ناحیه لیبراژد
page.text:
{{Infobox settlement | name = استان لیبراژد | native_name = Rrethi i Librazhdit | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = استان | image_skyline = Vilson Blloshmi Genc Leka Memorial.JPG | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = AlbaniaLibrazhd.png | mapsize = 150px | map_alt = | map_caption = محل استان لیبراژد در نقشهٔ آلبانی | image_map1 = | map_alt1 = | map_caption1 = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | latd = 41 |latm = 11 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 20 |longm = 24 |longs = |longEW = E | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_type = | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = [[فهرست کشورهای جهان|کشور]] | subdivision_name = {{ALB}} | subdivision_type1 = [[فهرست شهرهای آلبانی|مرکز]] | subdivision_name1 = [[لیبراژد]] | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = | seat = | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = - | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric<!-- or US or UK --> | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 1,023 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 63,192 | population_as_of = ۲۰۱۰ | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = | website = <!-- {{URL|example.com}} --> | footnotes = }}
نام یکی از استان‌های سی‌وشش‌گانه کشور [[آلبانی]] است.
مرکز این استان شهر [[لیبراژد]] است.
== منابع == ویکی‌پدیای انگلیسی.
